page.title: 07Brian Duncan ....Bowler
page.content:
Mr. Duncan is a crown green bowler. He started playing at the age of 12, his father taught him He has played for 30 years and practicesghts a week on the Railway Public House green He travels up to 100 miles for a match a appeared about a dozen times on television. Prizes can be up to $500
The most difficult green to play on is arze Wood Hall. He does not enjoy being a spectator
A crown green bowlers ultimate goal is to win the Waterloo Cup at Blackpool.
There are no professional lady players. He plays snooker for fun In the future he would like to try his h at flat top bowling.
